Name: Multidimensional memory topography in the medial parietal cortex identified from neuroimaging of thousands of daily memory videos
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Bainbridge, W. A., & Baker, C. I. (2022). Multidimensional memory topography in the medial parietal cortex identified from neuroimaging of thousands of daily memory videos. Nature Communications, 13, 6508.
Funding: Intramural Research Program of the National Institutes of Health (ZIA-MH-002909)
EthicsApprovals: National Institute of Mental Health Clinical Study Protocol 93-M-1070 (NCT00001360)
Acknowledgements: Thank you to Cesar Kuriyama of the app 1 Second Everyday to allow us to use their app for this study.
